text: Futhi ukube uMvelinqangi wayebabamba (abajezise) abantu ngenxa yokona kwabo wayengeke ashiye kuwona (umhlaba) ngisho noma sinye isidalwa kepha ubahlehlisa kuze kube isikhathi esinqunyiwe ngakho-ke uma sesifikile isikhathi sabo angeke bakwazi ukulibambezela ihora futhi angeke bakwazi ukuliqhubekisa
